name: notesify
description: A Notes taking for Developers from a Developer

scripts.dev:client:start: yarn substep:set-environment:client --environment=dev && cd apps/client && yarn serve
scripts.dev:server:start: yarn substep:set-environment:server --environment=dev && cd apps/server && yarn start:dev
scripts.dev:all:lint: yarn dev:root:lint && yarn dev:client:lint && yarn dev:server:lint && yarn dev:shared:lint
scripts.dev:client:lint: yarn substep:set-environment:client --environment=dev && cd apps/client && yarn lint
scripts.dev:server:lint: yarn substep:set-environment:server --environment=dev && cd apps/server && yarn lint
scripts.prod:client:build: yarn substep:set-environment:client --environment=prod && cd apps/client && yarn build
scripts.prod:server:build: yarn substep:set-environment:server --environment=prod && cd apps/server && yarn build
scripts.test:client:unit: yarn substep:set-environment:client --environment=dev && cd apps/client && yarn test:unit
scripts.test:server:unit: yarn substep:set-environment:server --environment=dev && cd apps/server && yarn test
scripts.test:client:e2e: yarn substep:set-environment:client --environment=dev && cd apps/client && yarn test:e2e
scripts.test:server:e2e: yarn substep:set-environment:server --environment=dev && cd apps/server && yarn test:e2e
scripts.prod:server:start: yarn substep:set-environment:server --environment=prod && cd apps/server && yarn start:prod
scripts.utils:install-packages:all: yarn utils:install-packages:shared && yarn utils:install-packages:client && yarn utils:install-packages:server
scripts.checkYarn: echo "$npm_execpath" | grep -q "yarn\.js$" || (echo '⚠️  Use YARN not NPM! ⚠️ ' && echo && exit 1)
